Frequently Asked Questions

What Is Content Writing?

Content writing is the process of planning, writing and editing web content, typically for digital marketing purposes.

What Are The Benefits Of Content Writing?
  1. Increases The Authority Of Your Website.
  2. Gives the exact overview of your website.
  3. The means to connect with customers effectively.
How Often I Will Get Report?

Reporting solely depends on the chosen Content Writing package. You can probably count on it happening every month or every week.

What Package Should I Choose?

Content Writing Package should be chosen as per your business goals and objectives.

Does It Work?

Content is regarded as the KING of any website. The inclusion of quality content in your site makes the user attract to it.

How Can I Trust Rankon Technologies?
  1. 100% Original And Fresh Content
  2. Industry-Focused & Relevant
  3. SEO & Digital Marketing Friendly
  4. Thoroughly Edited & Proofread
  5. Impeccable Grammar & Spelling Check
  6. Well Placed Keywords
  7. Checked Manually & Through Online Tools
  8. Relevant Call-To-Actions With Each
What Details I Have To Provide?

When you contract with us for your content writing needs, then you have to give the following details to us:

  1. History of your business
  2. Founder of your business
  3. Your Business Niche
  4. Mission and Vision Of Your Business
  5. Your specialization
  6. Your customer goals
